contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 11, 1979 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Elegy from Entertainments. 7 bands competed.
1st Prize: £150.00 (Mk Championship trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Sterling Grade trophy) 3rd Prize: £50.00
March 7, 2011, 1:08 p.m. Nov. 28, 2020, 11:02 a.m.
1 Hyundai Heart of England Roy Curran
2 Newham Band Ray Farr
3 Foresters Brass Paul Wright
Unknown Result Towcester Studio Band William Scholes
Unknown Result Ibstock Brick Brass Allan Street
Unknown Result John Dickinson (Apsley) Band D. Henderson
Withdrawn City of Coventry Brass Band Leonard Pepper
